components/category/product-listing:
{{category.name}}

{{> components/category/category-filter sort=pagination.category.sort}} {{!--{{> components/common/filter pagination.category}}--}} {{!--{{> components/products/filter sort=pagination.category.sort}}--}}
{{#if theme_settings.product_list_display_mode '===' 'grid'}} {{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}} {{> components/products/grid products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings event="list" }} {{else}} {{> components/products/grid products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings}} {{/if}} {{else}} {{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}} {{> components/products/list products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings event="list" }} {{else}} {{> components/products/list products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
{{> components/common/paginator pagination.category totalCount=category.total_products}}
components/category/category-filter:
{{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}} {{!----}} {{> components/faceted-search/index category}} {{else}} {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}} {{/if}}
{{> components/category/sort-box sort=sort}}
components/products/filter:
<form class="actionBar sort-products" method="get" data-sort-by>
    {{> components/category/sort-box sort=sort}}
</form>

{{#each products}}
  • {{>components/products/card settings=../settings show_compare=../show_compare show_rating=../settings.show_product_rating theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer event=../event position=(add @index 1)}}
    • {{/each}}

    • {{/each}}
